item.title: lm2ntlm with John the Ripper
item.author: mubix
item.description: Since I didn’t see any documentation bringing how to take an LM hash that you’ve cracked and convert it to the NTLM equivalent all in one place. And I google how to do it almost every time. I wanted to put all these links in one place and remember how to do it for john. Go-go-gadget blog-notes. So there is this: https://github.com/snarez/rcracki/blob/master/lm2ntlm.cpp And this: https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/master/tools/lm2ntcrack.rb And this: http://www.securityfocus.com/tools/6696 And the edited version of the above: http://atenlabs.
